Performance:
May 1976: The Love of Osome and Hisamatsu

Production: May 1976

Play: The Love of Osome and Hisamatsu (染模様妹背門松)

– Click image to view.

Scenes:

The Oil Store (油店 / Aburamise)

The Ikutama Shrine (生玉鳥居前 / Ikutama torii mae)

The Pawnshop (質店 / Shichimise)

In front of the Storehouse (蔵前 / Kuramae)

Characters:

Osome (Musume Osome / 娘お染)

Hisamatsu (Decchi Hisamatsu / 丁稚久松)

Zenroku (Bantō Zenroku / 番頭善六)

Rin (Gejo Rin / 下女りん)

Tasaburo (Segare Tasaburō / 伜多三郎)

Oito (Geigi Oito / 芸妓おいと)

Seibei (Yamagaya Seibei / 山家屋清兵衛)

Okatsu (Haha Okatsu / 母おかつ)

Genemon (Ōzakaya Gen'emon / 大阪屋源右衛門)

Rihei (Kodōguya Rihei / 小道具屋利兵衛 )

Ballad book peddler (Saimon uri / 祭文売り(門つけ))

Pawnshop customer (Shichiuke otoko / 質受男)

Female pawner (Shichiire nyōbō / 質入女房 (質置嬶))

Kyusaku (Hyakushō Kyūsaku / 百姓久作 )

Tarobei (Oya Tarobei / 親(油屋)太郎兵衛)

Maids (Gejo / 下女)
